org.apache.ctakes.ytex.kernel.metric

Class ConceptInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ctakes.ytex.kernel.metric.ConceptInfo

  • public class ConceptInfo
extends Object
    we run into out of memory errors when preloading the intrinsic ic for large concept graphs. 'compress' the depth a tiny bit by using short instead of int.

    Tried using float instead of double, but didn't get into the under 1gb range for very large concept graphs, so just use double to avoid precision errors.

    Author:
    vijay
